sentence.text: I want to tell you a true story.
sentence.textCn: 我要告诉你一个真实的故事。

sentence.text: It happened to a friend of mine a year ago.
sentence.textCn: 这是一年前发生在我的一位朋友身上的故事。

sentence.text: While my friend, George, was reading in bed, two thieves climbed into his kitchen.
sentence.textCn: 当我的朋友乔治在床上看书时，两个小偷爬进了他的厨房。

sentence.text: After they had entered the house, they went into the dining room.
sentence.textCn: 他们进到屋里后，走进了饭厅。

sentence.text: It was very dark, so they turned on a torch.
sentence.textCn: 饭厅里很暗，于是他们打开了手电筒。

sentence.text: Suddenly, they heard a voice behind them.
sentence.textCn: 突然他们听到身后有声音。

sentence.text: The thieves dropped the torch and ran away as quickly as they could.
sentence.textCn: 小偷扔下了手电筒，飞快地逃走了。

sentence.text: George heard the noise and came downstairs quickly.
sentence.textCn: 乔治听到了响声，迅速地下了楼。

sentence.text: He turned on the light, but he couldn't see anyone.
sentence.textCn: 他开了灯，但不见一个人。

sentence.text: But George's parrot, Henry, was still there.
sentence.textCn: 但是乔治的鹦鹉亨利仍在那里。
